snippet.title: Get Together | Preview
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1505540/Get_Together/

Two lost beings and you are their only bond.. 
Play with a friend to guide them on their journey to reunite in this communication-based coop puzzle adventure. You play on two devices with no connection except the one of your voice! 

Can you both grow beyond the challenges and - Get Together - again?

For more, follow us:
https://twitter.com/StudioSterneck
https://www.instagram.com/studiosterneck
